message: Let's be fair and close the deal!
I understand you want to be fair, so I'm offering you the same deal, just flipped.  Let's close it out.
You didn't accept my first offer, and now the money is worth less. I need a bit more.
The value is dropping quickly!  I'm offering you more than you would have gotten last round. Let's be smart and take it.
We're running out of time, and the money is losing value fast. I'm willing to take a bigger share to end this.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. The money is losing value with each round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Take it or leave it.
